title: An Act making the charter of the county on Nantucket gender neutral

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Moakley of Falmouth and Senator Cyr, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4504) of Thomas W. Moakley (by vote of the town) for legislation to make the charter of the county on Nantucket gender neutral.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/23/2025 from 02:00 PM-02:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting
Read second and ordered to a third reading
Read third (title changed) and passed to be engrossed
Read; and placed in the Orders of the Day for the next session
